trans-unit.source: The breakpoint, below which, the Navbar will collapse. When true the Navbar will always be expanded regardless of screen size.
trans-unit.target: 断点（低于此断点），导航栏将折叠。当 true 的导航栏将始终无论屏幕尺寸的扩大。

trans-unit.source: The checked state of the input, managed by <ToggleButtonGroup> automatically
trans-unit.target: 输入的检查状态，由 <ToggleButtonGroup> 自动管理

trans-unit.source: The content of the non-toggle Button.
The current active key that corresponds to the currently expanded card
trans-unit.target: 当前展开的卡片所对应的当前活动键。

trans-unit.source: The custom FormFile will by default not visibly display your selected file. This requires additional JS. The recommended plugin to animate custom file input is bs-custom-file-input.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，自定义 FormFile 将不会显示您选择的文件。这需要附加的JS。动画化自定义文件输入的推荐插件是bs-custom-file-input。
自定义 select 元素支持大小调整。

trans-unit.source: The default active key that is expanded on start
trans-unit.target: 启动时展开的默认活动键

trans-unit.source: The default active key that is selected on start
trans-unit.target: 启动时选择的默认活动键

trans-unit.source: The dimension used when collapsing, or a function that returns the dimension
trans-unit.target: 折叠时使用的维度,或返回维度的函数。

trans-unit.source: The disabled state of both the label and input
trans-unit.target: 标签和输入的禁用状态

trans-unit.source: The disabled state of the NavItem item.
The example below provides an example of accessible usage of this component.
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子提供了这个组件的无障碍使用的例子。

trans-unit.source: The example below uses a flexbox utility to vertically center the contents and changes <Col> to <Col xs="auto"> so that your columns only take up as much space as needed. Put another way, the column sizes itself based on on the contents.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用flexbox实用工具将内容垂直居中，并将 <Col> 更改为 <Col xs="auto"> 以便您的列仅占用所需的空间。换句话说，该列将根据其内容自行调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The general visual variant a the Navbar. Use in combination with the bg prop, background-color utilities, or your own background styles.
trans-unit.target: 一般的视觉变体是Navbar。与 bg 属性， background-color 实用程序或您自己的背景样式结合使用。

trans-unit.source: The initial flip state of the Overlay.
The initial visibility state of the Overlay.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖层的初始可见性状态。

trans-unit.source: The input type of the rendered buttons, determines the toggle behavior of the buttons
trans-unit.target: 渲染按钮的输入 type ，确定按钮的切换行为

trans-unit.source: The issue tracker is the preferred channel for bug reports, features requests and submitting pull requests. See more about how we use issues in the contribution guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 问题跟踪器是错误报告，功能请求和提交请求的首选渠道。在贡献准则中详细了解我们如何使用问题。

trans-unit.source: The language for the button when using custom file input and SCSS based strings
trans-unit.target: 当使用自定义文件输入和基于SCSS的字符串时,按钮的语言。

trans-unit.source: The media object helps build complex and repetitive components (e.g. blog comments, tweets, the like and more) where some media is positioned alongside content that doesn’t wrap around said media. Plus, it does this with only two required classes thanks to flexbox. Below is an example of a single media object. Only two classes are required—the wrapping Media and the Media.Body around your content. Optional padding and margin can be controlled through spacing utilities.
trans-unit.target: 媒体对象有助于构建复杂且重复的组件（例如，博客评论，推文等），其中某些媒体与不会环绕所述媒体的内容一起放置。另外，由于使用了flexbox，它仅用两个必需的类就可以做到这一点。以下是单个媒体对象的示例。只需要两个类-包装您的内容的 Media 和 Media.Body 。可选的填充和边距可以通过间隔实用程序进行控制。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that will fit next to each other on extra large devices (≥1200px)
trans-unit.target: 在超大型设备（≥1200像素）上彼此相邻的列数

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that will fit next to each other on extra small devices (<576px)
trans-unit.target: 在超小型设备（<576px）上彼此相邻的列数

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that will fit next to each other on large devices (≥992px)
trans-unit.target: 在大型设备上（≥992px），彼此相邻的列数

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that will fit next to each other on medium devices (≥768px)
trans-unit.target: 在中等设备（≥768像素）上彼此相邻的列数

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that will fit next to each other on small devices (≥576px)
trans-unit.target: 小型设备上彼此相邻的列数（≥576px）

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span on extra large devices (≥1200px)
trans-unit.target: 在超大型设备（≥1200px）上要跨越的列数

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span on extra small devices (<576px)
trans-unit.target: 在超小型设备上跨越的列数（<576px）

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span on large devices (≥992px)
trans-unit.target: 在大型设备上跨越的列数（≥992px）

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span on medium devices (≥768px)
trans-unit.target: 在中型设备上跨越的列数（≥768px）

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span on small devices (≥576px)
trans-unit.target: 在小型设备上跨越的列数（≥576px）

trans-unit.source: The placement of the Overlay in relation to it's target.
trans-unit.target: 相对于其 target 的Overlay的位置。

trans-unit.source: The presence of children does not skip the wrapping span, use as along with children for custom rendering
trans-unit.target: 的存在 children 不会跳过包装 span ，使用 as 伴随着 children 的自定义呈现

trans-unit.source: The size attribute of the underlying HTML element. Specifies the visible width in characters if as is 'input'. Specifies the number of visible options if as is 'select'.
trans-unit.target: 基础HTML元素的size属性。指定字符的可见宽度如果 as 是 'input' 。如果 as 'select' ，则指定可见选项的数量。

trans-unit.source: The string for the "Browse" text label when using custom file input
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义文件输入时,"浏览 "文本标签的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The toggle content. When empty, the default toggle will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 切换内容。当为空时,将显示默认的切换内容。

trans-unit.source: The underlying HTML element to use when rendering the FormCheck.
The underlying HTML element to use when rendering the FormCheckInput.
The underlying HTML element to use when rendering the FormControl.
trans-unit.target: 渲染FormControl时要使用的底层HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: The underlying HTML element to use when rendering the FormFile.
trans-unit.target: 渲染FormFile时要使用的底层HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: The underlying HTML element to use when rendering the FormFileInput.
trans-unit.target: 渲染FormFileInput时要使用的基础HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: The value of the input, should be unique amongst it's siblings when nested in a ToggleButtonGroup.
trans-unit.target: 当嵌套在 ToggleButtonGroup 中时，输入的值在同级之间应该是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The value, or array of values, of the active (pressed) buttons
trans-unit.target: 激活(按下)按钮的数值或数值数组。

trans-unit.source: The visibility of the Overlay. show is a controlled prop so should be paired with onToggle to avoid breaking user interactions.
trans-unit.target: 叠加层的可见性。 show 是一个受控制的道具，因此应与 onToggle 配对使用，以避免破坏用户交互。

trans-unit.source: The visual color style of the spinner
trans-unit.target: 旋转器的视觉色彩风格

trans-unit.source: The visual style of the badge
The visual variant of the nav items.
The wrapping HTML element to use when rendering the FormFile.
trans-unit.target: 渲染FormFile时要使用的包装HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: Theming the navbar has never been easier thanks to the combination of theming classes and background-color utilities. Choose from variant="light" for use with light background colors, or variant="dark" for dark background colors. Then, customize with the bg prop or any custom css!
trans-unit.target: 导航主题的主题从未如此简单，这要归功于主题类和背景颜色实用程序的结合。从 variant="light" 用于浅色背景，或从 variant="dark" 选择深色背景色。然后，使用 bg 属性或任何自定义CSS进行自定义！

trans-unit.source: There are responsive variants to horizontal: setting it to {sm|md|lg|xl} makes the list group horizontal starting at that breakpoint’s min-width.
trans-unit.target: 有一些针对 horizontal 响应变体：将其设置为 {sm|md|lg|xl} 可使列表组从该断点的 min-width 开始变为水平。

trans-unit.source: Things to know about the React-Boostrap Overlay components.
trans-unit.target: 关于React-Boostrap Overlay组件的注意事项。

trans-unit.source: This component may be used to wrap child elements or components.
trans-unit.target: 该组件可用于包裹子元素或组件。

trans-unit.source: This component requires a single child element
trans-unit.target: 该组件需要一个单一的子元素

trans-unit.source: This is required for custom check controls or when type="switch" due to how they are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义检查控件或由于其呈现方式而在 type="switch" 时，这是必需的。

trans-unit.source: This is generally provided by the Overlay component positioning the popover
trans-unit.target: 这通常是由放置弹出框的 Overlay 组件提供的

trans-unit.source: This is generally provided by the Overlay component positioning the tooltip
trans-unit.target: 这通常是由 Overlay 工具提示的Overlay组件提供的

trans-unit.source: To encourage extensible and predictable toasts, we recommend a header and body. Toast headers use display: flex, allowing easy alignment of content thanks to our margin and flexbox utilities.
trans-unit.target: 为了鼓励可扩展和可预测的吐司,我们推荐使用页眉和正文。吐司头使用display:flex,由于我们的margin和flexbox实用程序,可以轻松对齐内容。

trans-unit.source: To ensure the maximum accessibility for spinner components it is recommended you provide a relevant ARIA role property, and include screenreader-only readable text representation of the spinner's meaning inside the component using Bootstrap's sr-only class.
trans-unit.target: 为确保微调器组件的最大可访问性，建议您提供一个相关的ARIA role 属性，并使用Bootstrap的 sr-only 类在组件内部包括微调器含义的仅限屏幕阅读器的可读文本表示形式。

trans-unit.source: To properly show rounded corners in an <InputGroup> with validation, the <InputGroup> requires the hasValidation prop.
trans-unit.target: 正确显示的圆角在 <InputGroup> 与验证， <InputGroup> 需要 hasValidation 道具。

trans-unit.source: To set a button's active state simply set the component's active prop.
trans-unit.target: 要设置按钮的活动状态，只需设置组件的 active 道具。

trans-unit.source: Toasts are as flexible as you need and have very little required markup. At a minimum, we require a single element to contain your “toasted” content and strongly encourage a dismiss button.
trans-unit.target: 吐司随您需要而灵活，几乎不需要标记。至少，我们需要一个元素来包含您的“敬酒”内容，并强烈建议您使用“关闭”按钮。

trans-unit.source: Toasts are lightweight notifications designed to mimic the push notifications that have been popularized by mobile and desktop operating systems. They’re built with flexbox, so they’re easy to align and position.
trans-unit.target: 敬酒是一种轻量级的通知，旨在模仿已被移动和桌面操作系统普及的推送通知。它们是使用flexbox构建的，因此易于对齐和定位。

trans-unit.source: Toggle contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and more with the Bootstrap dropdown plugin
trans-unit.target: 使用Bootstrap下拉插件切换上下文覆盖,以显示链接列表等。

trans-unit.source: Toggle the action prop to create actionable list group items, with disabled, hover and active styles. List item actions will render a <button> or <a> (depending on the presence of an href) by default but can be overridden by setting the as prop as usual.
trans-unit.target: 切换 action 道具以创建具有禁用，悬停和活动样式的可操作列表组项目。默认情况下，列表项操作将呈现 <button> 或 <a> （取决于 href 的存在），但是可以通过照常设置 as prop来覆盖它们。

trans-unit.source: Toggles expanded to false after the onSelect event of a descendant of a child <Nav> fires. Does nothing if no <Nav> or <Nav> descendants exist.
trans-unit.target: 子 <Nav> 的子代的onSelect事件触发后，切换 expanded 为 false 。如果不存在 <Nav> 或 <Nav> 后代，则不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Toggles the active state of the TabPane, this is generally controlled by a TabContainer.
trans-unit.target: 切换TabPane的活动状态,一般由TabContainer控制。

trans-unit.source: Tooltip expects specific props injected by the <Overlay> component
trans-unit.target: 工具提示需要由 <Overlay> 组件注入的特定道具

trans-unit.source: Tooltips for disabled elements must be triggered on a wrapper element.
trans-unit.target: disabled 元素的工具提示必须在包装器元素上触发。

trans-unit.source: Transition onEnter callback when animation is not false
trans-unit.target: 动画不为 false 时过渡onEnter回调

trans-unit.source: Transition onEntered callback when animation is not false
trans-unit.target: 动画不为 false 时过渡onEntered回调

trans-unit.source: Transition onEntering callback when animation is not false
trans-unit.target: 动画不为 false 时onEntering回调的过渡

trans-unit.source: Transition onExit callback when animation is not false
trans-unit.target: 动画不为 false 时过渡onExit回调

trans-unit.source: Transition onExited callback when animation is not false
trans-unit.target: 动画不为 false 时过渡onExited回调

trans-unit.source: Transition onExiting callback when animation is not false
trans-unit.target: 动画不为 false 时过渡onExiting回调

trans-unit.source: Translating or customizing the strings with HTML
trans-unit.target: 用HTML翻译或自定义字符串。

trans-unit.source: Translating or customizing the strings with SCSS
Trigger dropdown menus above, below, left, or to the right of their toggle elements, with the drop prop.
trans-unit.target: 使用 drop 道具触发其切换元素上方，下方，左侧或右侧的下拉菜单。

trans-unit.source: Turn an image into a card background and overlay your card’s text. Depending on the image, you may or may not need additional styles or utilities.
trans-unit.target: 将图像变成卡片背景并覆盖卡片的文本。根据图像，您可能需要也可能不需要其他样式或实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Uniquely idenifies the NavItem amongst its siblings, used to determine and control the active state of the parent Nav
trans-unit.target: 在同级中唯一地标识 NavItem ，用于确定和控制父级 Nav 的活动状态

trans-unit.source: Unlike vanilla Bootstrap, autoFocus works in Modals because React handles the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 与普通的Bootstrap不同， autoFocus 在Modals中起作用，因为React处理实现。

trans-unit.source: Unmount tabs (remove it from the DOM) when it is no longer visible
trans-unit.target: 当标签不再可见时,将其卸载(从DOM中移除)。

trans-unit.source: Unmount tabs (remove it from the DOM) when they are no longer visible
trans-unit.target: 当标签不再可见时,将其卸载(从DOM中移除)。

trans-unit.source: Unmount the component (remove it from the DOM) when it is collapsed
trans-unit.target: 当组件被折叠时,将其卸载(从DOM中移除)。

trans-unit.source: Unmount the component (remove it from the DOM) when it is faded out
trans-unit.target: 当组件被淡出时,将其卸载(从DOM中移除)。

trans-unit.source: Unmount the tab (remove it from the DOM) when it is no longer visible
trans-unit.target: 当标签不再可见时,将其卸载(从DOM中移除)。

trans-unit.source: Use <Card.Body> to pad content inside a <Card>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <Card.Body> 将内容填充到 <Card> 中。

trans-unit.source: Use <Form inline> and your various form controls within the Navbar. Align the contents as needed with utility classes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <Form inline> 和导航栏中的各种表单控件。根据需要使内容与实用程序类对齐。

trans-unit.source: Use responsive="sm", responsive="md", responsive="lg", or responsive="xl" as needed to create responsive tables up to a particular breakpoint. From that breakpoint and up, the table will behave normally and not scroll horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要使用 responsive="sm" ， responsive="md" ， responsive="lg" 或 responsive="xl" 来创建直到特定断点的响应表。从该断点开始，该表将正常运行并且不会水平滚动。

trans-unit.source: Use size on <FormControl> and <FormLabel> to change the size of inputs and labels respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在 <FormControl> 和 <FormLabel> 上使用 size 分别更改输入和标签的大小。

trans-unit.source: Use size="sm" to make tables compact by cutting cell padding in half.
trans-unit.target: 使用 size="sm" 通过将单元格填充减半来使表紧凑。

trans-unit.source: Use variant="dark" to invert the colors of the table and get light text on a dark background.
trans-unit.target: 使用 variant="dark" 反转表格的颜色，并在深色背景上获得浅色文本。

trans-unit.source: Use Bootstrap's custom form elements to replace the browser defaults
trans-unit.target: 使用Bootstrap的自定义表单元素来替换浏览器的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Use animation when showing or hiding <TabPane>s. Defaults to <Fade> animation, else use false to disable or a react-transition-group <Transition/> component.
trans-unit.target: 显示或隐藏 <TabPane> 时使用动画。默认为 <Fade> 动画，否则使用 false 禁用或react-transition-group <Transition/> 组件。

trans-unit.source: Use any of the available button style types to quickly create a styled button. Just modify the variant prop.
trans-unit.target: 使用任何可用的按钮样式类型可以快速创建样式按钮。只需修改 variant 道具即可。

trans-unit.source: Use contextual variants on <ListGroup.Item>s to style them with a stateful background and color.
trans-unit.target: 在 <ListGroup.Item> 上使用上下文变体，以有状态的背景和颜色设置它们的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use spacing and flex utilities to size and position content
trans-unit.target: 使用间距和弹性工具来调整内容的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the InputGroup.Radio or InputGroup.Checkbox to add options to an input group.
trans-unit.target: 使用 InputGroup.Radio 或 InputGroup.Checkbox 将选项添加到输入组。

trans-unit.source: Use the expand prop as well as the Navbar.Toggle and Navbar.Collapse components to control when content collapses behind a button.
trans-unit.target: 使用 expand 道具以及 Navbar.Toggle 和 Navbar.Collapse 组件来控制内容何时隐藏在按钮后面。

trans-unit.source: Use the expand prop to allow for collapsing the Navbar at lower breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 使用 expand 道具可以在较低的断点处折叠Navbar。

trans-unit.source: Use the fluid to scale image nicely to the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 fluid 将图像很好地缩放到父元素。

trans-unit.source: Use the horizontal prop to make the ListGroup render horizontally. Currently horizontal list groups cannot be combined with flush list groups.
trans-unit.target: 使用 horizontal 道具使ListGroup水平呈现。当前水平列表组不能与刷新列表组结合。

trans-unit.source: Use the inline prop to display a series of labels, form controls, and buttons on a single horizontal row. Form controls within forms vary slightly from their default states.
trans-unit.target: 使用 inline 道具在单个水平行上显示一系列标签，表单控件和按钮。表单中的表单控件与其默认状态略有不同。

trans-unit.source: Use the rounded, roundedCircle and thumbnail props to customise the image.
trans-unit.target: 使用 rounded ， roundedCircle 和 thumbnail 道具自定义图像。

trans-unit.source: Use the striped, bordered and hover props to customise the table.
trans-unit.target: 使用 striped ， bordered 和 hover 道具自定义表格。

trans-unit.source: Use this when your input group contains both an input and feedback element.
trans-unit.target: 当您的输入组同时包含输入和反馈元素时,请使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Uses controlId from <FormGroup> if not explicitly specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用 controlId 从 <FormGroup> 如果没有明确规定。

trans-unit.source: Uses a gradient to create a striped effect.
trans-unit.target: 使用渐变来创建条纹效果。

trans-unit.source: Uses a gradient to create a striped effect. Not available in IE8.
trans-unit.target: 使用渐变来创建条纹效果。在IE8中不可用。

trans-unit.source: Using <Card.Title>, <Card.Subtitle>, and <Card.Text> inside the <Card.Body> will line them up nicely. <Card.Link>s are used to line up links next to each other.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <Card.Title> ， <Card.Subtitle> ，和 <Card.Text> 内的 <Card.Body> 将很好地排列起来。 <Card.Link> 用于将链接彼此相邻排列。

trans-unit.source: Using color to add meaning only provides a visual indication, which will not be conveyed to users of assistive technologies – such as screen readers. Ensure that information denoted by the color is either obvious from the content itself (e.g. the visible text), or is included through alternative means, such as additional text hidden with the .sr-only class.
trans-unit.target: 使用颜色添加含义仅提供视觉指示，而不会传达给辅助技术的用户（例如屏幕阅读器）。确保用颜色表示的信息在内容本身（例如可见文本）中是显而易见的，或者是通过替代方式包括的，例如用 .sr-only 类隐藏的其他文本。

trans-unit.source: Using responsive alignment will disable Popper usage so any dynamic positioning features such as flip will not work.
trans-unit.target: 使用响应式对齐将禁用Popper的使用，因此任何动态定位功能（例如 flip 将无法使用。

trans-unit.source: Value passed to the onSelect handler, useful for identifying the selected menu item.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 onSelect 处理程序的值，对于标识所选菜单项很有用。

trans-unit.source: Visually represent nav items as "tabs". This style pairs nicely with tabbable regions created by our Tab components.
trans-unit.target: 直观地将导航项表示为“选项卡”。这种样式与我们的Tab组件创建的可Tabable区域很好地配对。

trans-unit.source: Wait until the first "enter" transition to mount tabs (add them to the DOM)
trans-unit.target: 等到第一次 "回车 "过渡时再去挂载标签(将它们添加到DOM中

trans-unit.source: Wait until the first "enter" transition to mount the component (add it to the DOM)
trans-unit.target: 等到第一次 "enter "过渡时,才将组件挂载到DOM中(将其添加到DOM中)。

trans-unit.source: Wait until the first "enter" transition to mount the tab (add it to the DOM)
trans-unit.target: 等到第一次 "回车 "过渡时,再加载标签(将其添加到DOM中)。

trans-unit.source: Watch out! <a> elements don't naturally support a disabled attribute. In browsers that support it this is handled with a point-events: none style but not all browsers support it yet.
trans-unit.target: 小心！ <a> 元素自然不支持 disabled 属性。在支持它的浏览器中，这是通过 point-events: none 处理的：没有样式，但不是所有的浏览器都支持它。

trans-unit.source: Watch out! Browsers provide their own validation UI by default on forms. You can disable the default UI by adding the HTML noValidate attribute to your <Form> or <form> element.
trans-unit.target: 小心！浏览器默认在 form s上提供自己的验证UI 。您可以通过将HTML noValidate 属性添加到 <Form> 或 <form> 元素来禁用默认UI 。

trans-unit.source: Watch out! You need to provide a breakpoint value to expand in order for the Navbar to collapse at all.
trans-unit.target: 小心！您需要提供一个要 expand 的断点值，以使Navbar完全折叠。

trans-unit.source: We aim to support all browsers supported by both React and Bootstrap.
trans-unit.target: 我们旨在支持React和Bootstrap支持的所有浏览器。

trans-unit.source: We are not committing to keeping breaking changes in lockstep with bootstraps major releases, there may be a react-bootstrap v2 targeting Bootstrap v4 depending on what's best for the project.
trans-unit.target: 我们不致力于在Bootstraps主要版本上保持同步变化，可能会根据项目的最佳状态针对Bootstrap v4推出react-bootstrap v2。

trans-unit.source: We provide react-bootstrap.js and react-bootstrap.min.js bundles with all components exported on the window.ReactBootstrap object. These bundles are available on unpkg, as well as in the npm package.
trans-unit.target: 我们提供在 window.ReactBootstrap 导出的所有组件的 react-bootstrap.js 和 react-bootstrap.min.js 捆绑包。ReactBootstrap对象。这些捆绑软件可在unpkg以及npm软件包中找到。

trans-unit.source: We welcome community support with both feature and bug reporting. Please don't hesitate to jump in. Join our growing list of contributors.
trans-unit.target: 我们欢迎社区支持功能和错误报告。请随时加入。加入我们不断增加的贡献者名单。

trans-unit.source: We will continue to provide general maintenance for Bootstrap 3 components, because there are many projects that continue to depend on Bootstrap 3 support in react-bootstrap. react-bootstrap package versions will be as follows:
trans-unit.target: 我们将继续为Bootstrap 3组件提供常规维护，因为有许多项目继续依赖 react-bootstrap 中的Bootstrap 3支持。 react-bootstrap 软件包的版本如下：

trans-unit.source: When true The modal will automatically shift focus to itself when it opens, and replace it to the last focused element when it closes. Generally this should never be set to false as it makes the Modal less accessible to assistive technologies, like screen-readers.
trans-unit.target: 当为 true 时，模式将在打开时自动将焦点移至其自身，并在关闭时将其替换为最后一个聚焦的元素。通常，永远不要将其设置为false，因为它会使Modal不太容易被辅助技术（如屏幕阅读器）访问。

trans-unit.source: When true The modal will prevent focus from leaving the Modal while open. Consider leaving the default value here, as it is necessary to make the Modal work well with assistive technologies, such as screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 当为 true 时，模态将阻止焦点在打开时离开模态。考虑在此处保留默认值，因为有必要使Modal与辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）一起正常工作。

trans-unit.source: When true The modal will restore focus to previously focused element once modal is hidden
trans-unit.target: 当为 true 时，一旦隐藏了模态，模态将把焦点恢复到先前聚焦的元素

trans-unit.source: When true The modal will show itself.
trans-unit.target: 当为 true 时，模态将显示出来。

trans-unit.source: When a <ul> is appropriate you can render one via the as prop; be sure to also set your items to <li> as well!
trans-unit.target: 当 <ul> 合适时，您可以通过 as 道具渲染一个；请确保还将您的项目也设置为 <li> ！

trans-unit.source: When activating an asynchronous action from a button it is a good UX pattern to give the user feedback as to the loading state, this can easily be done by updating your <Button />s props from a state change like below.
trans-unit.target: 当通过按钮激活异步动作时，这是一个很好的UX模式，可以向用户提供有关加载状态的反馈，这可以通过从如下状态更改状态更新 <Button /> 道具来轻松完成。

trans-unit.source: When backdrop is set to static, the modal will not close when clicking outside it. Click the button below to try it.
trans-unit.target: 当背景设置为静态时,在其外点击模态将不会关闭。点击下面的按钮试试。

trans-unit.source: When customizing the FormFile rendering it is important to note the order of the label and input elements.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 FormFile 呈现时，注意 label 和 input 元素的顺序很重要。

trans-unit.source: When no column widths are specified the Col component will render equal width columns
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定列宽，则 Col 组件将呈现等宽的列

trans-unit.source: When paired with actions, additional hover and active styles apply.
trans-unit.target: 与 action 配对时，将应用其他悬停和活动样式。

trans-unit.source: When the container is within your navbar, its horizontal padding is removed at breakpoints lower than your specified expand={'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl'} prop. This ensures we’re not doubling up on padding unnecessarily on lower viewports when your navbar is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 当容器在导航栏中时，在低于指定的 expand={'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl'} 属性。这样可以确保当导航栏折叠时，我们不会在不必要的情况下在较低视口上加倍填充。

trans-unit.source: When the role is "tablist", NavLink focus is managed according to the ARIA authoring practices for tabs: https://www.w3.org/TR/2013/WD-wai-aria-practices-20130307/#tabpanel
trans-unit.target: 当角色为“标签列表”时，将根据ARIA标签的创作规范来管理NavLink焦点：https ://www.w3.org/TR/2013/WD-wai-aria-practices-20130307/#tabpanel

trans-unit.source: When this prop is set, it creates a Card with a Card.Body inside passing the children directly to it
trans-unit.target: 当这个道具被设置后,它就会创建一个带有Card.Body的Card,里面直接把孩子们传给它。

trans-unit.source: When this prop is set, it creates a Popover with a Popover.Content inside passing the children directly to it
trans-unit.target: 当这个道具被设置时,它将创建一个Popover.Content,里面的孩子直接传递给它。

trans-unit.source: When you have multiple toasts, we default to vertically stacking them in a readable manner.
trans-unit.target: 当你有多个吐司时,我们默认以可读的方式垂直堆叠它们。

trans-unit.source: When you need tighter control, or want to customize how the FormCheck component renders, it may better to use it's constituent parts directly.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要更严格的控制或想要自定义 FormCheck 组件的呈现方式时，最好直接使用其组成部分。

trans-unit.source: When you need tighter control, or want to customize how the FormFile component renders, it may be better to use it's constituent parts directly.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要更严格的控制或想要自定义 FormFile 组件的呈现方式时，最好直接使用它的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: When you render a FormCheck without a label (no children) some additional styling is applied to keep the inputs from collapsing. Remember to add an aria-label when omitting labels!
trans-unit.target: 当您呈现不带标签的FormCheck（无 children ）时，将应用一些其他样式以防止输入折叠。记得在省略标签时添加一个 aria-label 标签！

trans-unit.source: Whether or not the Dropdown is visible.
Whether the carousel should cycle continuously or have hard stops.
trans-unit.target: 转盘是要连续循环还是有硬停。

trans-unit.source: Whether the carousel should react to keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 旋转木马是否应该对键盘事件做出反应。

trans-unit.source: Whether the carousel should support left/right swipe interactions on touchscreen devices.
trans-unit.target: 转盘是否应该支持触屏设备的左右滑动交互。

trans-unit.source: Whether to render the dropdown menu in the DOM before the first time it is shown
trans-unit.target: 是否在DOM中的下拉菜单第一次显示之前渲染它

trans-unit.source: Which event when fired outside the component will cause it to be closed
trans-unit.target: 哪种事件在组件外部触发会导致组件被关闭?

trans-unit.source: Which event when fired outside the component will cause it to be closed.
trans-unit.target: 当在组件外部触发哪个事件会导致组件被关闭。

trans-unit.source: While Bootstrap will apply these styles in all browsers, Internet Explorer 11 and below don’t fully support the disabled attribute on a <fieldset>. Use custom JavaScript to disable the fieldset in these browsers.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Bootstrap将在所有浏览器中应用这些样式，但是Internet Explorer 11及更低版本并不完全支持 <fieldset> 上的 disabled 属性。使用自定义JavaScript禁用这些浏览器中的字段集。

trans-unit.source: While multiple inputs are supported visually, validation styles are only available for input groups with a single input.
trans-unit.target: 虽然视觉上支持多个输入,但验证样式只适用于单一输入的输入组。

trans-unit.source: While not required, you can wrap the Navbar in a <Container> component to center it on a page, or add one within to only center the contents of a fixed or static top navbar.
trans-unit.target: 虽然不是必需的，但您可以将Navbar包裹在 <Container> 组件中，以使其在页面上居中，或在其中添加一个以仅将固定或静态顶部导航栏的内容居中。

trans-unit.source: Wrap a series of <Button>s in a <ButtonGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 将一系列 <Button> 包装在 <ButtonGroup> 中。

trans-unit.source: You also add the controlId prop to accessibly wire the nested label and input together via the id.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以添加 controlId 属性以方便地将嵌套标签连接起来，并通过 id 一起输入。

trans-unit.source: You can also control the Carousel state, via the activeIndex prop and onSelect handler.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过 activeIndex 属性和 onSelect 处理程序来控制Carousel状态。

trans-unit.source: You can also control the visual state directly which is great if you want to build more complicated alerts.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以直接控制视觉状态,如果你想建立更复杂的警报,这是很好的。

trans-unit.source: You can also create non-interactive dropdown items with <Dropdown.ItemText>. Feel free to style further with custom CSS or text utilities.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 <Dropdown.ItemText> 创建非交互式下拉项。随意使用自定义CSS或文本实用程序进一步设置样式。

trans-unit.source: You can also mix and match breakpoints to create different grids depending on the screen size.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以根据屏幕大小混合和匹配断点以创建不同的网格。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the visible options of your select element.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以指定 select 元素的可见选项。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Tab components to create ARIA compliant tabbable interfaces with the <ListGroup> component. Swap out the <Nav> component for the list group and you are good to go.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用Tab组件与 <ListGroup> 组件一起创建与ARIA兼容的Tabbable接口。交换列表组的 <Nav> 组件，一切就好了。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <Form.Switch> alias which encapsulates the above, in a very small component wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在一个很小的组件包装器中使用 <Form.Switch> 别名将上述内容封装起来。

trans-unit.source: You can apply custom css to the modal dialog div using the "dialogClassName" prop. Example is using a custom css class with width set to 90%.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 "dialogClassName "道具将自定义css应用到模态对话框中。例子是使用一个自定义的css类,宽度设置为90%。

trans-unit.source: You can change a card's appearance by changing their <bg>, and <text> props.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过更改卡的 <bg> 和 <text> 道具来更改卡的外观。

trans-unit.source: You can control the the direction and orientation of the Nav by making use of the flexbox layout utility classes. By default, navs are left-aligned, but that is easily changed to center or right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过使用flexbox布局实用程序类来控制 Nav 的方向和方向。默认情况下，导航是左对齐的，但是很容易将其更改为居中或右对齐。

trans-unit.source: You can manually apply the props to any element you want or split them up. The example below shows how to position the overlay to a different element than the one that triggers its visibility.
trans-unit.target: 你可以手动将道具应用到任何你想要的元素上,也可以将它们分割开来。下面的例子展示了如何将叠加定位到与触发其可见性的元素不同的元素上。

trans-unit.source: You can mix and match the Dropdown components with the NavLink and NavItem components to create a Dropdown that plays well in a Nav component
trans-unit.target: 您可以将Dropdown组件与NavLink和NavItem组件混合和匹配,以创建一个在Nav组件中运行良好的Dropdown。

trans-unit.source: You can now hook into the Accordion toggle functionality via useAccordionToggle to make custom toggle components.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以通过 useAccordionToggle 连接到Accordion切换功能，以创建自定义切换组件。

trans-unit.source: You can pass the Overlay injected props directly to the Tooltip component.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将 Overlay 注入的道具直接传递到工具提示组件。

trans-unit.source: You can place other button types within the <ButtonGroup> like <DropdownButton>s.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 <ButtonGroup> 中放置其他按钮类型，例如 <DropdownButton> 。

trans-unit.source: You can set breakpoints for the fluid prop. Setting it to a breakpoint (sm, md, lg, xl) will set the Container as fluid until the specified breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为 fluid 道具设置断点。将其设置为断点（ sm, md, lg, xl ）会将 Container 设置为流体，直到指定的断点为止。

trans-unit.source: You can size the <FormLabel> using the column prop as shown.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用如图所示的列prop调整 <FormLabel> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a container to control the DOM element the overlay is appended to. This is especially useful when styles conflict with your Overlay's.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定一个 container 来控制叠加层附加到的DOM元素。当样式与叠加图冲突时，此功能特别有用。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a bootstrap large or small modal by using the "size" prop.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用 "size "道具来指定一个大的或小的bootstrap模式。

trans-unit.source: You can specify individual intervals for each carousel item via the interval prop.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过 interval 属性为每个轮播项目指定单独的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: You can then remix that once again with size-specific column classes.
trans-unit.target: 然后,你可以用特定大小的列类再次重新混合。

trans-unit.source: You can use <Container fluid /> for width: 100% across all viewport and device sizes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <Container fluid /> 作为宽度：在所有视口和设备尺寸中为100％。

trans-unit.source: You can use Bootstrap's position utilities to place navbars in non-static positions. Choose from fixed to the top, fixed to the bottom, or stickied to the top (scrolls with the page until it reaches the top, then stays there). Fixed navbars use position: fixed, meaning they’re pulled from the normal flow of the DOM and may require custom CSS (e.g., padding-top on the <body>) to prevent overlap with other elements. Also note that .sticky-top uses position: sticky, which isn’t fully supported in every browser.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Bootstrap的位置实用程序将导航栏放置在非静态位置。从固定到顶部，固定到底部或固定在顶部进行选择（滚动页面直到到达顶部，然后停留在顶部）。固定的导航栏使用 position: fixed ，这意味着它们是从DOM的正常流程中拉出的，并且可能需要自定义CSS（例如， <body> 上的padding-top ）以防止与其他元素重叠。另请注意， .sticky-top 使用 position: sticky ，并非所有浏览器都完全支持它。

trans-unit.source: You can use a custom element for this component
trans-unit.target: 你可以为这个组件使用一个自定义元素

trans-unit.source: You can use a custom element type for this component's inner link.
trans-unit.target: 你可以为这个组件的内部链接使用自定义元素类型。

trans-unit.source: You can use a custom element type for this component.
trans-unit.target: 你可以为这个组件使用自定义元素类型。

trans-unit.source: You can use a custom element type for this component. For none action items, items render as li. For actions the default is an achor or button element depending on whether a href is provided.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为此组件使用自定义元素类型。对于没有 action 项目，项目将显示为 li 。对于操作，默认值是achor或button元素，具体取决于是否提供了 href 。

trans-unit.source: You can use grid layouts within a model using regular grid components inside the modal content.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在模型中使用模式内容内的常规网格组件来使用网格布局。

trans-unit.source: You can use the order property to control the visual order of your content.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 order 属性来控制内容的视觉顺序。

trans-unit.source: You can vertically center a modal by passing the "centered" prop.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过 "居中 "道具将一个模态垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: You don't need to include frameborder="0" in your iframes.
You may add a header by adding a <Card.Header> component.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过添加 <Card.Header> 组件来添加标题。

trans-unit.source: You may also swap <Row> for <Form.Row>, a variation of the standard grid row that overrides the default column gutters for tighter and more compact layouts.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以将 <Row> 交换为 <Form.Row> ，这是标准网格行的一种变体，它将覆盖默认的列装订线，以实现更紧凑，更紧凑的布局。

trans-unit.source: You may need to manually address the width and alignment of individual form controls with spacing utilities (as shown below). Lastly, be sure to always include a <Form.Label> with each form control, even if you need to hide it from non-screenreader visitors with the srOnly prop.
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要使用间距实用程序手动解决单个表单控件的宽度和对齐问题（如下所示）。最后，即使您需要使用 srOnly 属性向非屏幕阅读者隐藏它，也要确保每个表单控件始终包含一个 <Form.Label> 。

trans-unit.source: You may wish to have different styles for the toggle if it's associated section is expanded, this can be achieved with a custom toggle that is context aware and also takes advantage of the useAccordionToggle hook.
trans-unit.target: 如果展开了与它关联的部分，您可能希望开关具有不同的样式，这可以通过具有上下文意识的自定义开关来实现，并且可以利用 useAccordionToggle 挂钩。

trans-unit.source: You must specify an id when using custom check controls or switches. Event handlers are triggered by linking the label with the input via id.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义检查控件或开关时，必须指定 id 。通过将标签通过 id 与输入链接来触发事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You should import individual components like: react-bootstrap/Button rather than the entire library. Doing so pulls in only the specific components that you use, which can significantly reduce the amount of code you end up sending to the client.
trans-unit.target: 您应该导入单个组件，例如： react-bootstrap/Button 而不是整个库。这样做只会引入您使用的特定组件，从而可以显着减少最终发送给客户端的代码量。

trans-unit.source: added InputGroup.Prepend, InputGroup.Append, InputGroup.Text, InputGroup.Checkbox, InputGroup.Radio
all(PropTypes.bool, ({ custom, id }) => custom && !id ? Error('Custom check controls require an id to work') : null, )
trans-unit.target: all（PropTypes.bool，（{{custom，id}）=> custom &&！id？Error（'自定义检查控件需要一个id才能起作用'）：null，）

trans-unit.source: all(PropTypes.string, ({ custom, lang }) => lang && !custom ? Error('`lang` can only be set when custom is `true`') : null, )
badges Use the pill modifier class to make badges more rounded (with a larger border-radius and additional horizontal padding). Useful if you miss the badges from v3.
trans-unit.target: 徽章使用 pill 修饰符类可使徽章更圆（具有更大的 border-radius 和附加的水平 padding ）。如果您错过了v3的徽章，该功能将非常有用。

trans-unit.source: boolean | "auto" | number | { span: boolean | "auto" | number, offset: number, order: "first" | "last" | number }
bsPrefixes are not passed from the parent Dropdown anymore
buttons may be one of a variety of visual variants such as:
trans-unit.target: 按钮可以是各种视觉变体中的一种,如。

trans-unit.source: consolidated col span, offset, and order into an object value prop per breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 将col span ， offset 和 order 合并为每个断点的对象值prop。

trans-unit.source: default element changed to <div> from a <li>
trans-unit.target: 默认元素从 <li> 更改为 <div> >
菜单中只能包含 role="menuitem" ， role="menuitemcheckbox" 或 role="menuitemradio" 。

trans-unit.source: onSelect behavior is now passed to Menu and Toggle via the Context api
trans-unit.target: onSelect行为现在通过Context api传递给Menu和Toggle。

trans-unit.source: positioning props have been consolidated into fixed={top|bottom} and sticky={top|bottom}, staticTop has been removed
trans-unit.target: 定位道具已合并为 fixed={top|bottom} 和 sticky={top|bottom} ，staticTop已被移除
移除了 Label ， Badge 组件涵盖了

trans-unit.source: removed fluid, use your own Container component in.
trans-unit.target: 除去 fluid ，请使用您自己的 Container 组件。
更名为 DropdownItem （还远销上 Dropdown 的 Dropdown.Item ）
重命名为 FormLabel （也在 Form 上导出为 Form.Label ）

trans-unit.source: to passthrough to the underlying button or whatever from DropdownButton
trans-unit.target: 从DropdownButton穿透到底层按钮或其他什么东西。

trans-unit.source: vertically center the Dialog in the window
trans-unit.target: 对话框在窗口中垂直居中。
